title: The Wind on the Heath
creator_credit: Peter Jessop, Leon Bijon and Cecil Musk
brief_description: Explores places of scenic beauty and historic interest amid the mountains and valleys of Britain’s ten National Parks. Against the background of river, mountain and mooorland landscape of river, mountain and moorland landscape, some of the pastimes available to all in the Parks are shown, including climbing in Snowdonia, skiing, and boating on the lakes, and hiking or pony trekking on the moors.
